refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.simpara: Returns an indexed array containing the name of all stream filters available on the running system.

example.title: Using stream_get_filters
example.programlisting:
<?php $streamlist = stream_get_filters(); print_r($streamlist);
/* Output will be similar to the following Note: there may be more or fewer filters in your version of PHP --------------------------------------- Array ( [0] => string.rot13 [1] => string.toupper [2] => string.tolower [3] => string.base64 [4] => string.quoted-printable ) */ ?>
